articles.description: New Zealand face India in the Champions in Dubai - follow live cricket scores, text updates, in-play video clips and radio commentary
articles.title: Champions Trophy LIVE: New Zealand vs India, Dubai – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: England's record 90-4 defeat by Australia in Las Vegas was an experience akin to being in a washing machine, according to Amy Hardcastle - and laid bare the gulf between the teams.
articles.title: Australia 90-4 England: Amy Hardcastle compares tough night to being in washing machine

articles.description: The Brazil forward was sent off late in extra time as Wolves were knocked out of the FA Cup by Bournemouth on penalties. But how costly will his dismissal be for the club's Premier League survival?
articles.title: Matheus Cunha: How costly will forward's red card prove for Wolves?

articles.description: A familiar white-ball defeat for England in Karachi must mark the start of their rebuild, writes Matthew Henry.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: England's defeat in Karachi should mark start of rebuild

articles.description: Former England captain Casey Stoney tells BBC Sport how she and her family have rebuilt their lives after her sacking by San Diego Wave left them effectively homeless.
articles.title: Casey Stoney: Ex-England captain on rebuilding after San Diego sacking and becoming Canada boss

articles.description: Former Australian motorcycle gang member and prisoner Ryan Peake has qualified for this year's Open at Portrush after winning the New Zealand Open.
articles.title: Ryan Peake: Convicted ex-motorcycle gang member and prisoner qualifies for Open with win

articles.description: WBA lightweight champion Gervonta Davis says grease from his hair got into his eyes and made him take a knee during a controversial draw against Lamont Roach Jr.
articles.title: Gervonta Davis v Lamont Roach Jr: WBA lightweight fight ends in controversial majority draw

articles.description: Julian Alvarez scores his 10th league goal of the season to help Atletico Madrid beat Athletic Bilbao and move top of La Liga.
articles.title: Atletico Madrid 1-0 Athletic Bilbao: Julian Alvarez hits winner to take side top

articles.description: Isco scores the winner against his former club as Real Betis beat Real Madrid to put a dent in their La Liga title hopes.
articles.title: Real Betis 2-1 Real Madrid: Isco nets winner against former club

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Manchester City vs Plymouth Argyle in the FA Cup
articles.title: Manchester City vs Plymouth Argyle: FA Cup stats & head-to-head
